DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label , Non-Randomized Trial Evaluate Tolerability Safety Viramune ( Nevirapine ) Adult Pediatric Patients With Progressive HIV Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible adult patient ( > = 13 year age ) receive treatment Viramune daily 2 week twice daily . Eligible pediatric patient ( < 13 year age ) receive low dose Viramune daily 2 week twice daily . All patient receive Viramune without concomitant antiretroviral therapy . Patients evaluate week 2 , 4 , 8 , 16 , 24 , 32 every 8 week thereafter . PER AMENDMENT 01/31/97 : Enrollment close adult patient . As 1/31/97 enrol pediatric patient .
